pageContext.claim: “Let me just say it wasn't so much a report. It was the questions and answers as the report was submitted and they were asked questions and answers.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests that the news reports of a split between his views and the assessment of the intelligence agencies stemmed from questions and answers that were given during testimony. But that's wrong. The news reports were based on the actual 2019 Worldwide Threat Assessment submitted to Congress.
